title: SteelSeries USB Apex 5 Hybrid Mechanical Gaming Keyboard – Per-Key RGB Illumination – Aircraft Grade Aluminum Alloy Frame – OLED Smart Display (Hybrid Blue Switch)
descriptions:
Experience the ultimate gaming keyboard with the SteelSeries USB Apex 5 Hybrid Mechanical Gaming Keyboard! Featuring a unique hybrid mechanical switch that combines the tactile click of a blue switch with the smooth membrane feel, this keyboard offers the perfect blend of responsiveness and comfort. 

With its OLED smart display, you can customize gifs, view game info, and even see Discord messages without ever leaving the game. The aircraft-grade aluminum alloy frame ensures durability, while the per-key RGB illumination adds a stunning visual element to your setup. The premium magnetic wrist rest provides full palm support for hours of comfortable gaming.

Compatible with Windows, Mac OS X, Xbox, and PlayStation, this keyboard is perfect for both gaming and general use. Plus, with IP32 water resistance, you can game worry-free. Upgrade your gaming experience with the SteelSeries USB Apex 5 Hybrid Mechanical Gaming Keyboard today!

Crafted with aircraft-grade aluminum alloy, this keyboard is built to last. The per-key RGB illumination adds a dynamic flair to your gaming setup, while the premium magnetic wrist rest provides full palm support and comfort during long gaming sessions. With IP32 water resistance and compatibility with Windows, Mac OS X, Xbox, and PlayStation, the SteelSeries USB Apex 5 is the perfect choice for both gaming and general use. Upgrade your gaming experience today with the SteelSeries USB Apex 5 Hybrid Mechanical Gaming Keyboard.
